pizza.name: Loaded Veggie BBQ
pizza.description: Thin & Crispy crust, loaded with Crunchy Onion, Green Capsicum, Red Bell Pepper, Juicy Corn, Mushroom, 100% mozzarella cheese, flavorful sauce, and a generous drizzle of signature barbeque sauce, folded over and baked, then brushed with herbed butter and sprinkled with our signature spice seasoning (255 Kcal/100g)

pizza.name: BBQ Baked Chicken Wings 4 Pcs
pizza.description: All New Baked BBQ chicken wings. Its juicy, spicy & so much flaourful (4Pcs) (206 Kcal/100g)

pizza.name: BBQ Baked Chicken Wings 6 Pcs
pizza.description: All New Baked BBQ chicken wings. Its juicy, spicy & so much flaourful (6Pcs) (206 Kcal/100g)

pizza.name: Cheezy Cheese Chicken
pizza.description: Thin & Crispy crust, loaded with juicy Chicken Sausage, Crunchy Onion , Green Capsicum, Red Bell Pepper, 100% mozzarella cheese, flavorful sauce, folded over and baked then brushed with herbed butter and sprinkled with cheezy seasoning (268 Kcal/100g)

pizza.name: Classic Bread Stix
pizza.description: Freshly baked buttery bread stick, sprinkled with herbs (287 Kcal/100g)

pizza.name: Loaded Breadstix
pizza.description: Freshly baked bread sticks, topped with cheesy dressing & herbs (320 Kcal/100g)

pizza.name: Zesty Chicken Pocket
pizza.description: Freshly Baked Pocket Stuffed With Chicken, Veggies & Smoked Texas Garlic Sauce (216 Kcal/100g)

pizza.name: Jalapeno Poppers
pizza.description: Jalapeno Poppers With Gooey White Sauce (250 Kcal/100g)

pizza.name: Tandoori Paneer Pasta
pizza.description: Penne pasta baked in your favorite tandoori sauce along with flavorful soft paneer, green capsicum, onion and red capsicum (231 Kcal/100g)

pizza.name: Spicy Red Schezwan Pasta
pizza.description: Fusilli pasta baked in Spicy Schezwan sauce, along with green capsicum, onion, red capsicum and paprika for an added zing (190 Kcal/100g)
